name: HAZUCHA B
title: 公衆の視点からみたパロディの著作権法における位置づけ
abstract: The research project will be a study on how the public views on the wrongfulness of two types of transformative uses of copyrighted works (i.e. parody and pastiche) align with the current copyright law trends in the studied countries (i.e. France, Germany and Japan).
section: 国際共同研究加速基金(国際共同研究強化(A))
review_section: 小区分05070:新領域法学関連
